projects.name: To-Do List Application
projects.description: Developed a full-featured To-Do List application with user authentication, task creation, updating, and deletion. Utilized Django's MVT architecture for efficient project structuring. Implemented MySQL for database management and SQL for data handling.

projects.name: Blog Application
projects.description: Created a blog platform with user sign-up, login, and CRUD operations for blog posts. Integrated MySQL database to manage blog data. Enhanced the application with features like comments, search, and categories.

projects.name: News Headlines Scraper
projects.description: Developed a Python script to scrape news headlines from a popular news website. Utilized BeautifulSoup for HTML parsing and structured the data into a CSV file for analysis.

experiences.description: Collaborated with a cross-functional team to develop intuitive UI/UX enhancements. Redesigned web pages leading to a 20% increase in user satisfaction.
Designed interactions for the VFGA project, a portal for listing food grains as assets in the stock market. Followed lean startup approach: MVP and rapid iterations.

experiences.company_name: Career Catalyst Event by HSS Dept., KIET Group of Institutions

full_output.name: Malya Srivastava
